name: Saro
description: Christmas time ! A popular and evergreen mix of fir , cedar, cypress
story: The smell inspires the popular Christmas tree. The mild citrus top notes, earthy undercurrents, and a woody, fir balsam core that makes you think “Christmastime.” Cozy and comforting, perfect for setting a festive holiday mood or creating the right ambience for a quiet winter evening by the fire.
